creator: manhole@max.hi-ho.ne.jp
text:
After I do "Commit Changes", Any Web Applications don't become effective again.
(Tomcat5.0.14 is OK)
Only HTTP 503 Error is returned.
If it reboots, it will return to normal.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I have fixed that already. Doing a relod of each application makes them work
without restarting Tomcat.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25033 ***
